description:
The Toraya Siblings participated in the Pofflés Contest near Shoyo City that Serena and Millefeui were also in. They ended up winning the contest with their Mugwort Dumpling Pofflé which Monarque noted had a Japanese taste and it created a novel style: Solace!
Their individual names were not revealed in the Japanese version of the anime.
name: Toraya Kyoudai
